items.question: How accurate are the AI explanations?
items.answer: Our AI provides highly accurate explanations using advanced models. However, we recommend verifying critical information with official sources.

items.question: What languages are supported?
items.answer: We support English, Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia), Filipino, and Swahili for both input and output.

items.question: Can I use this offline?
items.answer: While AI generation requires internet, you can download and review flashcards offline using our mobile app.

items.question: How does the free plan work?
items.answer: Free users get 5 AI-generated answers per day. This resets every 24 hours at midnight UTC.

items.question: What file formats are supported?
items.answer: Currently we support .txt and .pdf files. We're working on adding support for more formats.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your Pro subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and don't store unnecessary personal information. You can delete your data anytime.
